What exactly did you do? It seems strange that the view is open and yet the 
widget is disposed. How did you end up in this situation?

IIRC, this is what I was doing.

First I was playing around with the help view.  I had it opened, poking about, and then I closed it without 
incident.

I then went to the new wizard dialog and activated the docked help dialog.  Again, I poked about and 
closed it without incident.

Some time later I opened preferences and did my activities pass.  I just disabled everything and hit OK and 
got the provided error along with a dialog referencing it.
Cannot reproduce, but will keep it around in case it happens again.
